00011     {

00013         System.out.println("Cirle area: " + circle.getArea());

00017 abstract class Shape
00018 {
00019     public abstract Number getArea();        
00020 }
00021 
00022 class Circle extends Shape
00023 {
00024     Double area;
00025 
00026     public Circle(double radius)
00027     {
00028         area = new Double(Math.PI * radius * radius);
00029     }
00030     
00031     // This won't compile -- incompatible return type
00032     //public Double getArea()
00033 
00034     // This will
00035     public Number getArea()
00036     {
00037         return area;
00038     }
00039 }
